Load CPS data

load_cps.Rd

More description

load_cps(
  years,
  sample,
  months = NULL,
  variables = NULL,
  extracts_dir = NULL,
  val_labels = TRUE
)

Arguments

years

years of CPS data (integers)
sample

CPS sample ("org", "basic", "may")
months

months of data to load, only for monthly files
variables

variables to keep
extracts_dir

directory where EPI extracts are
val_labels

when TRUE, add value labels to variables

Value

a tibble of CPS microdata

Examples

load_cps(years = 2018:2019, sample = "org")
#> Error in io___MemoryMappedFile__Open(path, mode): IOError: Failed to open local file '/private/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T/RtmpODk4PR/filef69781ba255/reference/epi_cpsorg_2018.feather'. Detail: [errno 2] No such file or directory
